        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Strategies: Identifying relationships</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesestrategien: Kennzeichnen von von 
Verhältnissen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Stratégies de Lecture : Identification des
rapports</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estratégias Da Leitura: Identificando 
relacionamentos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strategie Della Lettura: Identificare i 
rapporti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στρατηγικές ανάγνωσης: Προσδιορισμός των σχέσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estrategias De la Lectura: Identificar 
lazos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a worksheet where the student is required to answer questions relating to connector phrases in the short texts which they read</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">relationships</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Bogen, in dem der Kursteilnehmer 
benoetigt wird, Fragen in bezug auf Steckerphrasen in den kurzen 
Texten zu beantworten, die sie lesen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un tableau où l'étudiant est requis de 
répondre à des questions concernant des expressions de connecteur 
dans les textes courts qu'ils lisent</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha onde o estudante seja requerido
responder às perguntas que se relacionam às frases do conector nos 
textos curtos que lêem</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio di lavoro in cui l'allievo è 
tenuto a rispondere alle domande per quanto riguarda le frasi del 
connettore nei testi corti che leggono</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας όπου ο σπουδαστής 
πρέπει για να απαντήσει στις ερωτήσεις σχετικά με τις φράσεις 
συνδέσμων στα κοντά κείμενα που διαβάζουν</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja de trabajo donde requieren al 
estudiante contestar a preguntas referente a frases del conector en 
los textos cortos que leen</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
